examples: Our tour guide showed us around the old town.
Nuestro guía turístico nos mostró el casco antiguo.
We hired a local guide to get us across the mountains.
Contratamos a un guía local para que nos llevara a través de las montañas.
A guru is the spiritual guide of his students.
Un gurú es la guía espiritual de sus estudiantes.
His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.
Su hermana mayor había sido su guía, consejera y amiga.
